full_summary:
# Cancelled Solicitation Notice

## Notice Information
*   **Notice Title (English)**: Cancelled-AR22SLGR
*   **Notice Title (French)**: Annulé-AR22SLGR
*   **Reference Number**: PW-22-01015947
*   **Amendment Number**: 1
*   **Solicitation Number**: AR22SLGR
*   **Publication Date**: 2022-12-06
*   **Closing Date and Time**: 2026-03-31 14:00:00 (EST)
*   **Amendment Date**: 2022-12-07
*   **Notice Status (English)**: Cancelled
*   **Notice Status (French)**: Annulé

## Procurement Information

The notice for the Request for Information (RFI) solicitation PW-22-01015947 was cancelled on December 7, 2022.

### Goods and Services

The procurement relates to construction services, including:

*   Construction of One and Two Dwelling Buildings
*   Construction of Multi-Dwelling Buildings
*   Construction of Warehouses and Industrial Buildings
*   Construction of Other Buildings

Note that the NSPS codes and Supplier Names do not make sense given the provided GSIN description and NO GID codes were found.


### Trade Agreements

This procurement may be subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)


### Regions of Opportunity

The contract may be executed in the following regions:

*   Canada
*   United States
*   Europe
*   Mexico

## Contact Information

*   **Contact Name**: Smith, Mark
*   **Email**: mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
*   **Phone**: 613-859-0549


Note that there is no notice URL or any documents available for attachments for further information on this specific case.
